game.name: Asantria
game.shortDescription: An intriguing top-down game with a cartoonish pixel art style! Move around the map in all directions while viewing your character from above! Use various types of magic to shoot and fight monsters! Also use different outfits that will give you additional advantages in the game world!
game.shortDescriptionEn: An intriguing top-down game with a cartoonish pixel art style! Move around the map in all directions while viewing your character from above! Use various types of magic to shoot and fight monsters! Also use different outfits that will give you additional advantages in the game world!
